title: Analyze Social Media Sentiment for a New Show
description: Following the premiere of a new series, an agent must analyze social media sentiment to gauge audience reaction.

tasks.description: Gather all social media posts mentioning the new show from the last 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a dataset of thousands of posts from Twitter, Instagram, and Reddit.

tasks.description: Run a sentiment analysis model on the collected data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model classifies sentiment as 65% positive, 20% neutral, and 15% negative.

tasks.description: Identify the main topics of conversation within the positive and negative posts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that viewers love the lead actor but dislike a major plot twist.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report of the findings for the marketing and production teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a concise report highlighting key audience reactions.
